welcome.title: Welcome in the BrotherHoods Discord
welcome.description: Welcome to the server, {userID}! ðŸŽ‰ We are glad to have you join us in the BrotherHoods community. Please take a moment to read through our rules and guidelines, and don't hesitate to reach out to a member of the community or a moderator if you have any questions or need any help. We look forward to getting to know you better and having you be a part of our community.

rules.title: âœ¨ BrotherHoods Discord Rules âœ¨
rows: Be respectful to all members of the BrotherHoods community.
No cheating, hacking, or exploiting in the Discord.
No spamming or excessive use of caps in chat.
No sharing personal information of others without their consent.
No excessive trolling or harassment of other players.
No advertising or self-promotion in the chat or voice channels.
No racism, sexism, or discrimination of any kind.
English only in the main chat channels. Other languages are allowed in designated channels.
Keep discussions and content appropriate for all ages.
Any violations of these rules will result in appropriate disciplinary action, including but not limited to warnings, kicks, and bans.
rules.description: By joining the BrotherHoods community, you also agree to abide by the general Discord terms of service and community guidelines. Any violations of these rules may result in disciplinary action from both the BrotherHoods moderators and Discord administrators. Let's all work together to create a fun and inclusive environment for everyone to enjoy.
